TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AccessKeyPressedEventHandler(object sender, AccessKeyPressedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AccessKeyPressedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AccessKeyPressedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AccessKeyPressedEventArgs)
public delegate void AccessKeyPressedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AccessKeyPressedEventArgs ^ e);
type AccessKeyPressedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AccessKeyPressedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的访问密钥 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 由管理器类处理，该管理器类的作用类似于访问密钥的服务，并将访问密钥输入转发到 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 输入系统。Access keys in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] are handled by a manager class that acts somewhat like a service for access keys, and forwards access key input to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input system. 通常情况下，最好是通过 命令绑定将访问密钥与特定命令相关联，并通过相应的路由事件处理路由命令，而不是专门通过附加特定对象上附加事件的处理程序来处理访问键按下事件。Rather than handling access key pressed events specifically by attaching a handler for the attached event on a specific object, it is generally a better practice to associate the access key with a particular command through a command binding, and then handle the routed commands through the corresponding routed events. 此方法为用户输入提供统一的事件系统，而不考虑输入模式启动输入的方式。This technique provides a unified event system for user input regardless of what input mode initiated the input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For more information, see [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview).
